text: Copa do Brasil is a Brazilian football competition. It is a knockout competition played by 87 teams. ==Champions== Season Champions Runner-up 1989 Grêmio Sport Recife 1990 Flamengo Goiás 1991 Criciúma Grêmio 1992 Internacional Fluminense 1993 Cruzeiro Grêmio 1994 Grêmio Ceará 1995 Corinthians Paulista Grêmio 1996 Cruzeiro Palmeiras 1997 Grêmio Flamengo 1998 Palmeiras Cruzeiro 1999 Juventude Botafogo 2000 Cruzeiro São Paulo 2001 Grêmio Corinthians Paulista 2002 Corinthians Paulista Brasiliense 2003 Cruzeiro Flamengo 2004 Santo André Flamengo 2005 Paulista Fluminense 2006 Flamengo Vasco da Gama 2007 Fluminense Figueirense 2008 Sport Recife Corinthians Paulista 2009 Corinthians Paulista Internacional 2010 Santos F.C. E.C. Vitória 2011 Vasco da Gama Coritiba 2012 Palmeiras Coritiba 2013 Flamengo Atlético Paranaense ==References== Category:Football in Brazil Category:Football competitions in South America Category:1989 establishments in Brazil
title: Copa do Brasil
